title: Nanaka-san no Inzei Seikatsu Nyuumon
original_name: ななかさんの印税生活入門
sinopse:
Nanaka is a middle school girl who dreams of becoming a writer. Having experienced hardships from being raised by two novelist parents, she resolves to become an author who makes more from royalties than they do.

(Source: Comic Natalie, translated)
